content: A graphic designer's next step in evolution could be to expand their skill set to include more advanced technology and software, such as 3D modeling and animation, virtual and augmented reality, and motion graphics. They could also consider expanding their expertise in user experience (UX) design, user interface (UI) design, and front-end web development. Additionally, a graphic designer could continue to develop their understanding of different industries and the specific design challenges and opportunities they present. This would help them to better serve their clients and create more effective and targeted design solutions.
